mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_TABLE (POST_NO, POST_DATE, POST_TITLE, MEM_ID, POST_CONTENT, MEM_NICKNAME) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(POST_NO)+1, 1) FROM BOARD_TABLE), SYSDATE, #{post_title}, #{mem_id}, #{post_content}, #{mem_nickname})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD_TABLE ORDER BY POST_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN (#{page} - 1) * 10 + 1 AND #{page} * 10
mapper.update: UPDATE CLAP_TABLE SET CLAP = (SELECT CASE WHEN CLAP + #{addition} >= 50 Then 50 else CLAP + #{addition} end FROM CLAP_TABLE WHERE POST_NO = #{post_no} AND MEM_ID = #{mem_id}) WHERE POST_NO = #{post_no} AND MEM_ID = #{mem_id}
UPDATE BOARD_TABLE SET TOTAL_CLAP = (SELECT SUM(CLAP) FROM CLAP_TABLE WHERE CLAP_TABLE.POST_NO = #{post_no}) WHERE POST_NO = #{post_no}
mapper.select: SELECT POST_NO, POST_DATE, POST_TITLE, MEM_ID, TOTAL_CLAP FROM BOARD_TABLE ORDER BY TOTAL_CLAP DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT_TABLE(com_no, post_no, com_field, create_date, mem_id) VALUES (NVL((SELECT MAX(COM_NO) FROM COMMENT_TABLE WHERE POST_NO = #{post_no})+1, 1), #{post_no}, #{com_field}, SYSDATE, #{mem_id})
mapper.select: SELECT POST_NO, POST_DATE, POST_TITLE, MEM_ID, TOTAL_CLAP, POST_CONTENT, MEM_NICKNAME FROM BOARD_TABLE ORDER BY POST_DATE DESC
